trans-unit.source: Show logs from a specific resource.
trans-unit.target: Show logs from a specific resource.

trans-unit.source: Failed to get logs for resource '{0}': {1}
trans-unit.target: Failed to get logs for resource '{0}': {1}

trans-unit.source: The number of recent log lines to show (default: 100).
trans-unit.target: The number of recent log lines to show (default: 100).

trans-unit.source: No running Aspire app host found. Please start the app host with 'aspire run' first.
trans-unit.target: No running Aspire app host found. Please start the app host with 'aspire run' first.

trans-unit.source: The path to the Aspire app host project file.
trans-unit.target: The path to the Aspire app host project file.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource to show logs for.
trans-unit.target: The name of the resource to show logs for.

trans-unit.source: Showing {1} recent log lines for resource '{0}'...
trans-unit.target: Showing {1} recent log lines for resource '{0}'...

trans-unit.source: Follow the log output in real-time.
trans-unit.target: Follow the log output in real-time.

trans-unit.source: Tailing logs for resource '{0}' (press Ctrl+C to exit)...
trans-unit.target: Tailing logs for resource '{0}' (press Ctrl+C to exit)...
